segments.text: Hello , Mr . Black , how are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , thank you , and how are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well , thank you . It's nice to meet you again . I am awfully sorry for not being able to meet you at the airport , as I was busy yesterday . I do hope you had a very enjoyable trip from New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , a very pleasant journey indeed . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How are you getting along with your business ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . The fur market is not very brisk lately , but the selling season is advancing near . I hope there will be more buyers in the market this year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope we can do more business together . Though we are satisfied with our past trade record , there are still possibilities for more business . In the meantime , let's discuss other spheres of cooperation , such as investment , technology transfer and technical assistance .
segments.speaker: S1
